examples.example: 热情的志愿者们耐心地为每一位游客指引方向和提供帮助。

translate.english: Enthusiastic volunteers patiently guide the direction and provide assistance to every tourist.

examples.example: 美丽的景区里迎来了许多欢乐的游客。

translate.english: Many happy tourists come to the beautiful scenic area.

examples.example: 友善的当地人热情地为游客介绍当地的特色文化和美食。

translate.english: Friendly local people enthusiastically introduce the local characteristic culture and delicacies to tourists.
